short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A utility chrome extension Hybris Admin Console

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A utility extension for Hybris Admin Console (hac). The extension helps in increasing hybris developer productivity by automated logging into local hybris admin console, performing update running system and enable debugging logs - all with a click of a button from browser.

Please ensure you have valid hybris certificate installed for localhost. Refer the following guide for more info about the chrome extension and how to install the certificate.

https://sites.google.com/view/hacextension/home
